data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in North Goa, Goa, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of North Goa, Goa, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to North Goa, Goa, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 799,077, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 8,998 believers in North Goa to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ponda
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ponda, Goa, India.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in North Goa, Goa, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 8,998 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of North Goa to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.
